name: AssessmentActivity
definition: activity involving the evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, ability, or value of someone or something
label: assessment activity

name: Appraisal
definition: written estimate of the market value of something as of some point in time, typically provided by a qualified appraiser
label: appraisal

name: AssessmentReport
label: assessment report
definition: report that includes an opinion, judgement, appraisal, or view about something and typically the methodology and raw inputs used to arrive at that opinion

name: AppraisedValue
label: appraised value
definition: estimated value of some asset as of a given point in time

name: Appraiser
label: appraiser
definition: party that evaluates or estimates the nature, quality, ability, or value of someone or something

name: ValueAssessment
definition: assessment event to estimate the value of something
label: value assessment
explanatoryNote: Note that an appraiser in this context may be a licensed appraiser, such as a real estate appraiser or auction house, or a calculation agent, depending on the circumstances.

name: AssessmentEvent
label: assessment event
definition: event involving the evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something

name: Opinion
definition: judgement, appraisal, or view about something
label: opinion

name: ValuationMethod
definition: method used to determine the present or expected worth of an asset
explanatoryNote: Asset valuation is the process of determining the fair market or present value of assets, using book values, absolute valuation models like discounted cash flow analysis, option pricing models or comparables. Such assets include investments in marketable securities such as stocks, bonds and options; tangible assets like buildings and equipment; or intangible assets such as brands, patents and trademarks.
label: valuation method

name: estimatesValueAt
label: estimates value at
definition: provides an approximate value of some asset as of some point in time

name: hasDateOfAssessment
definition: date on which an assessment process was completed
label: has date of assessment

name: isEstimatedValueOf
label: is estimated value of
definition: relates an appraised value to the asset of interest as of the date of the assessment

name: hasAppraiser
definition: relates an assessment or report to an agent that conducts the assessment
label: has appraiser

name: appliesMethodology
definition: indicates the strategy used for the purposes of determining the fair market or present value of something
label: applies methodology

name: hasEstimatedValue
definition: relates something to its estimated value
label: has estimated value
